entry.title: Opposites Attract
entry.summary:
Author: nowaywhyamihere

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,903Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 90

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t notice people—unless they give him a reason to. Most are too loud, too fake, or too eager to impress someone with his last name. But her? She was different. Always smiling, even at him. Always kind, even when he gave her nothing. He didn’t understand it, but he remembered it. And that was new.

entry.title: Mint and Pomegranade
entry.summary:
Author: PresidentHao

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,049Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 153

Summary: Damian could not believe that even after six years of trying to catch her he had not achieved anything; not the slightest trace of her identity, her lair or her plans, being even difficult to find the traces of her wanderings when these were not covered by the trail of blood she dragged with her.To prove his worth as Robin and gain his father's lost trust, he will once again descend into the depths of his origins, not counting that he would end up in a situation that would take him deeper into the darkness of Gotham than he could have imagined.

entry.title: I've Been The Archer, I've Been The Prey
entry.summary:
Author: Totallynotashieldagent

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,952Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 431

Summary: Reader's father and Bruce arranged for her and Damian to marry. However, before Reader's father could truly sit and explain to her his decision he passed away. And Damian never thought to question his father's decision at all.Reader's mother only saw dollar signs for this arrangement and forced it to happen much quicker than ever anticipated. Now it's just two strangers that have been forced together and trying to navigate the expectations of becoming the new IT couple of Gotham while trying to keep their secrets under wraps as Reader learns what it means to be the new Wayne Matriarch since the death of Martha Wayne.

entry.title: Monkeying .vs. Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Hisakoinoue

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,849Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Both have a dark past and a seemingly promising future. Damian Wayne is not an easy boy to get along with—but how can you blame him? He was raised as an assassin. You’re fairly reserved, trying not to stir up trouble for others; your past taught you that keeping a low profile was the best way to stay safe. A former assassin and a former victim might just be the perfect pairing to achieve heroic ambitions—or at the very least, to uncover a few mysteries along the way.*Originally published on Wattpad*
